description: Try chargrilled tandoori chicken on a bed of brown rice for a dinner that's a cinch to make. Using microwave rice makes this recipe super convenient.
keywords: Chicken dishes,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Egg free,Sesame free
name: Easy tandoori chicken Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 450g SunRice microwave Medium Grain Brown Rice

recipeInstructions.text: Combine paste, sugar, garlic powder and half the yoghurt in a bowl. Add chicken and turn to coat. Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour.
Brush a chargrill pan with oil and heat over high heat. Add chicken and cook for 6 minutes each side or until charred and cooked through. Thickly slice.
Meanwhile, heat rice according to packet instructions. Cook beans in a saucepan of boiling water for 1 minute or until just tender. Drain.
Divide rice and beans among plates. Top with chicken and remaining yoghurt. Season with pepper. Sprinkle with mint and serve with lemon.
